title: Over the Ocean
description: "Look Mia, I know you really want to blend in and resemble the locals. But, really . . . we are tourists. It will be easier if we start acting like tourists. I know I might seem odd, lost, and confused . . . and I guess I am. What I'm trying to say is that: . . .it's okay."This book is full of wonder and feminine follies! You will adore the story of Jill and Mia and the way their awkward relativity breaches globalized gaps!Delightful and quirky!
author: Danielle Rohr
